name: Pathfinder - Brackeys 2020.2
description:
Pathfinder - The time traveling stealth-puzzle game

Goal: Sneak into the warehouse completely undetected by rewinding time and using your knowledge of the guards' routes against them.

Controls:

Space - Open / Close planning screen

Q - Rewind time

WASD - Move planning screen

Note: The fullscreen mode doesn't work properly and was only enabled for people whos browser refuse to capture the window.

Created for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam using:

Unity, Paint.net, audacity and beepbox
